name: Snake Mold
description:
Game made in one week for Callum Upton's Game Jam

Disclaimer: This game is special to me, I want to make it something that I can be proud of but I'm aware it's not there yet. That being said I welcome any and all criticism in other to help me improve it.

Objective

Collect all data in the 7 computers and escape from the lab.

Controls

WASD to move

Use mouse to rotate character

E to interact

R to reload weapon

Credits

Programming: Void

OSTs and Sound Design: HakJob and Void

Sprites: Llanai and Void
